projects.title: Expense Tracker
projects.shortDescription: Full-stack expense management with JWT auth & analytics
projects.description: Full-stack expense management platform with JWT-based authentication and stateless REST APIs. Features pagination, filtering, analytics dashboards, CSV export, and undo-safe CRUD operations. Deployed on Render (backend) and Vercel (frontend).

projects.title: MediVision
projects.shortDescription: AI-powered medical image analysis for disease diagnosis
projects.description: AI-powered multi-disease medical image analysis system using CNNs to automate diagnosis across 5+ diseases. Features interactive Streamlit UI with confidence visualization, projecting 40% reduction in manual lookup time.

projects.title: Job Portal
projects.shortDescription: Role-based job portal for recruiters and applicants
projects.description: Full-stack job portal with role-based access control for recruiters and applicants. Secure JWT authentication, protected API routes, and automated job tracking that reduced recruiter workflow time by 35%.

projects.title: Text-to-Speech App
projects.shortDescription: Neural voice synthesis using Amazon Polly
projects.description: Web application using Amazon Polly for neural voice synthesis. Features real-time audio playback and downloadable speech output for seamless text-to-speech conversion.

projects.title: Crop Detection & Yield Prediction
projects.shortDescription: Satellite-based crop detection using YOLOv8 & NDVI
projects.description: Satellite-image-based crop detection and yield prediction pipeline using YOLOv8. Improved prediction reliability through NDVI-based vegetation analysis.
